mainText:
I am a Computer Information Technology Graduate student and an Army Captain in the Florida National Guard.  Today marks a very sad day for me and my constituents as Apple products and the innovation of Steve Jobs has defenitely revolutionized the world of technology and business as we know it.  I extend my greatest and warmest of condolences to the family of Steve Jobs and pray that his legacy lives on.  



P.S. Thank You very much Steve Jobs for all that you have done for the world.
author: Juan
